name: py-medusa
description: Medusa is a fork of SickRage that automates the downloading and organization of TV shows. It integrates with usenet and torrent clients to fetch episodes, rename files, and manage libraries.

features.title: Automatic Downloads
features.description: Monitor for new TV episodes and automatically download when available

features.title: Usenet And Torrent
features.description: Support for both usenet and torrent download clients with multiple provider options

features.title: Quality Profiles
features.description: Define preferred video quality and automatically upgrade episodes when better versions appear

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Automatically retry failed downloads or search for alternative sources

features.title: Subtitle Downloads
features.description: Automatically fetch subtitles in multiple languages for downloaded episodes

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize downloaded files with customizable naming patterns and folder structures

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: See upcoming episodes and air dates in a visual calendar interface
